#####
**Pipe operator**

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```
```{r}
df <- mtcars
head(df)
```
```{r}
result <- arrange(sample_n(filter(df, mpg > 20), size=5), desc(mpg))
result
```
```{r}
a <- filter(df, mpg > 20)
b <- sample_n(a, size=5)
result <- arrange(b, desc(mpg))
result
```
```{r}
# pipe
result <- df %>% filter(mpg > 20) %>% sample_n(size=5) %>% arrange(desc(mpg))
result
```
